Maven Archetype Beanshell-based Maven Plugin

This archetype will generate a skeleton Maven 2 Beanshell-Based Plugin

Usage

General instructions on how to use the this archetype can be found on the usage page. Some more specific use cases are described in the examples given below.

In case you still have questions regarding the plugin's usage, please have a look at the FAQ and feel free to ask a question. It is also worth browsing/searching previous issues.

If you feel like the plugin is missing a feature or has a defect, you can fill a feature request or bug report in our issue tracker. When creating a new issue, please provide a comprehensive description of your concern. Especially for fixing bugs it is crucial that the developers can reproduce your problem. For this reason, entire debug logs, POMs or most preferably little demo projects attached to the issue are very much appreciated. Of course, patches are welcome, too. Contributors can check out the project from our source repository.

Examples

To provide you with better understanding of some usages of the Maven Archetype Beanshell-based Maven Plugin, you can take a look at the following examples:
